channel.title: Crambe abyssinica on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Crambe abyssinica on funPlantGenes

item.title: CaFAD2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CaFAD2 Gene Name: fatty acid desaturase2 Genome: Species: Crambe abyssinica Functional Descriptions: The individual effect of each CaFAD2 gene on oil composition was investigated through studying transgenic lines (CaFAD2-RNAi) for differential expression levels in relation to the composition of seed-oil.
